snippet: Mauricio Macri, who arrived to Argentina's presidency vowing to clean up corruption, now finds himself ensnared in scandals of his own....

headline.main: N.A.A.C.P. President Has Candid Talk With Sessions About Civil Rights
headline.print_headline: N.A.A.C.P. Leader Sits Down With Sessions for Frank Talk

lead_paragraph: Mauricio Macri, who arrived to Argentina's presidency vowing to clean up corruption, now finds himself ensnared in scandals of his own.
